title: Netflix revises Warner Bros. bid to an all-cash offer
full_text:
Netflix revises Warner Bros. bid to an all-cash offer. Netflix has updated the acquisition terms for its Warner Bros. Discovery offer to an all-cash deal, replacing its initial $82.7 billion cash and stock agreement. The changes are designed to expedite the sale of WBD studios and streaming businesses, following ….
Netflix is hoping to expedite the acquisition by replacing its previous mixed cash and stock deal. Netflix is hoping to expedite the acquisition by replacing it… [+3418 chars]
